message.raw:
Bumped versions to max tagged in default, with exceptions.

Moved the line that needs sudo on linux earlier so it fails sooner and doesn't
leave half an install

Don't check for pywin32 if not windows

Don't print you're making shortcuts if we're on linux and you're not

message:
Bumped versions to max tagged in default, with exceptions.

Moved the line that needs sudo on linux earlier so it fails sooner and doesn't
leave half an install

Don't check for pywin32 if not windows

Don't print you're making shortcuts if we're on linux and you're not
